description:
Yoshinobu and the others receive word that Seimei has been found in a village West of Lake Biwa, and immediately head there after him. Having parted ways with the Shinsengumi after Kondo made the decision to serve Mugensai, Yamazaki is reunited with Kondo as if guided by the hand of fate. Meanwhile, Takasugi and Katsura have finished their anti-mechanical doll devices and work to set them up around the city, but when Takasugi returns to their safe house it is stormed by Hijikata and the Shinsengumi, and he is arrested. When Takasugi awakens later in one of the airships, he finds Mugensai before him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 激突, 最後のサムライ!
